ğŸ“In the real world, flying here gets you intercepted by fighter jets. In MSFS 2024, the sky is ours. Welcome to Forbidden Skies, a new series where we fly where no one else is allowed.

Today, we are breaching the perimeter of Groom Lake (Area 51). We dive into the history of this top-secret military base, famous for testing experimental weapons and legendary aircraft. Watch as we navigate the "Forbidden" R-4808N airspace and land on the dry lake bed that fuels so many conspiracy theories.
